contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 20, 2014 D Swiss Open
Swiss Open 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
swiss-open
Swiss Open Contest presented nearly 50 different Bands from 11 Countries in it's 25 Years of History till 2014. It was held in Kultur-Casino Bern first and since 1999 the 'Salle Blanche' in KKL Luzern provides a wonderful Frame for this popular Event.
See Also Contest Website: http://www.worldbandfestival.ch/ Switzerland
Set Test and Own Choice
Age of Innocence
Kultur und Kongresszentrum (KKL), Luzern, Switzerland 25th Edition
Best March: Wallberg Band Best Own Choice: Brass Band 13 Etoiles
other Own Choices, List: Carnival Ouverture (A.Dvorak), Die sizilianische Vesper - Ouv. (G.Verdi), Feste Romane (O.Respighi), le Corsaire (H.Berlioz), Ouv. "Fürst Igor" (A.Borodin), Pini di Roma (O.Respighi)
Nov. 26, 2013, 4:31 p.m. Sept. 27, 2015, 2:35 p.m.
1 Brass Band Treize Etoiles James Gourlay Russian Easter Festival Overture [N. Rimski-Korsakov, arr. B. Moren]
2 Valaisia Brass Band Arsène Duc
3 Brass Band Berner Oberland Corsin Tuor Jupiter (from The Planets Suite) [arr. Roberts]
4 Wallberg Brass Band Garry Cutt
5 Brassband Bürgermusik Luzern Michael Bach
6 Ensemble de Cuivres Valaisan Francois Roh Daphnis et Chloé, 2nd Suite
7 Brass Band Luzern Land Herve Grelat Une Nuit du Sabbat 'Symph. Phantastique' [arr. Snell]
8 Brass Band Fribourg Frédéric Théodoloz
9 Oberaargauer Brass Band Russell Gray
10 Ensemble de Cuivres Melodia Stéphane Duboux
